subject: Learning
title: Khan Academy: One Man's Whiteboard
description: Learn Khan Academy: One Man's Whiteboard in one minute.

hook.text: Sal Khan tutored his cousin via YouTube videos. Then 10 million strangers started watching.

buildup.text: Khan Academy grew from informal tutoring into a free platform covering math, science, and more.

discovery.text: The 'flipped classroom' model emerged: watch lectures at home, do practice problems in school.

twist.text: Critics argued videos alone don't teachâ€”interaction, feedback, and struggle are essential for learning.

climax.text: Khan Academy works best as a supplement, not a replacement for teaching.

punchline.text: A whiteboard and a voice reached more students than most schools ever will.

quiz.question: What is the flipped classroom model inspired by Khan Academy?
